  "description": "ResQ-X is more than just a roadside assistance service; we are your trusted partner in ensuring safety and reliability on Lagos roads.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Marketing Lead

Job Location:&nbsp;Victoria Island, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Role Overview


	The Marketing Lead will be responsible for shaping and executing the company&rsquo;s marketing vision, driving brand growth, generating qualified leads, and supporting revenue generation.
	This role requires a results-oriented leader with a proven ability to design high-impact marketing strategies, build strong brand positioning, and deliver measurable business outcomes.
	The successful candidate will oversee the marketing function, manage a high-performing team, and work closely with the sales department to convert leads into profitable business opportunities.


Key Responsibilities


	Strategic Leadership: Define and execute a comprehensive marketing strategy that aligns with the company&rsquo;s growth objectives.
	Revenue Growth: Design and implement marketing initiatives that generate qualified leads, strengthen conversion rates, and directly support sales targets.
	Brand Management: Lead corporate branding and positioning to enhance market presence, reputation, and competitiveness.
	Data-Driven Marketing: Leverage analytics and KPIs to measure marketing effectiveness, campaign ROI, and customer acquisition costs.
	Digital Transformation: Drive digital marketing strategies across SEO/SEM, social media, email, and automation platforms to maximize lead generation.
	Market Intelligence: Analyze customer insights, competitor strategies, and industry trends to inform decision-making and uncover new business opportunities.
	Budget Oversight: Manage marketing budgets, ensuring optimal allocation of resources for maximum impact.
	Leadership &amp; Team Development: Build, mentor, and lead a high-performing marketing team that consistently delivers results.


Qualifications &amp; Experience


	Bachelor&rsquo;s Degree in Marketing, Business Administration, or related discipline (MBA or professional certification preferred).
	5-7 years of progressive marketing experience, with at least 3years in a senior leadership role.
	Proven track record of delivering measurable marketing results, including lead generation, pipeline acceleration, and sales conversion.
	Strong expertise in B2B and B2C marketing, sales enablement, and revenue-focused campaign execution.
	Demonstrated success in closing deals through marketing-driven strategies.
	Proficiency in CRM platforms, marketing automation tools, and analytics software.
	Exceptional leadership, communication, and negotiation skills.


Remuneration
N450,000 - N500,000 / Month Net (Based on Experience).

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;careers@resqx.ng&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.",

Role Overview
     

            
    




	The Marketing Lead will be responsible for shaping and executing the company’s marketing vision, driving brand growth, generating qualified leads, and supporting revenue generation.
	This role requires a results-oriented leader with a proven ability to design high-impact marketing strategies, build strong brand positioning, and deliver measurable business outcomes.
	The successful candidate will oversee the marketing function, manage a high-performing team, and work closely with the sales department to convert leads into profitable business opportunities.


Key Responsibilities


	Strategic Leadership: Define and execute a comprehensive marketing strategy that aligns with the company’s growth objectives.
	Revenue Growth: Design and implement marketing initiatives that generate qualified leads, strengthen conversion rates, and directly support sales targets.
	Brand Management: Lead corporate branding and positioning to enhance market presence, reputation, and competitiveness.
	Data-Driven Marketing: Leverage analytics and KPIs to measure marketing effectiveness, campaign ROI, and customer acquisition costs.
	Digital Transformation: Drive digital marketing strategies across SEO/SEM, social media, email, and automation platforms to maximize lead generation.
	Market Intelligence: Analyze customer insights, competitor strategies, and industry trends to inform decision-making and uncover new business opportunities.
	Budget Oversight: Manage marketing budgets, ensuring optimal allocation of resources for maximum impact.
	Leadership & Team Development: Build, mentor, and lead a high-performing marketing team that consistently delivers results.


Qualifications & Experience


	Bachelor’s Degree in Marketing, Business Administration, or related discipline (MBA or professional certification preferred).
	5-7 years of progressive marketing experience, with at least 3years in a senior leadership role.
	Proven track record of delivering measurable marketing results, including lead generation, pipeline acceleration, and sales conversion.
	Strong expertise in B2B and B2C marketing, sales enablement, and revenue-focused campaign execution.
	Demonstrated success in closing deals through marketing-driven strategies.
	Proficiency in CRM platforms, marketing automation tools, and analytics software.
	Exceptional leadership, communication, and negotiation skills.


Remuneration
N450,000 - N500,000 / Month Net (Based on Experience).

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: careers@resqx.ng using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.
